mapper.insert: insert into article_modify_record (article_modify_id, article_id, category_id, article_title, article_author, article_summary, article_label, article_read_total, article_create_time, article_update_time, article_place_top, article_top_priority, article_attach_file, article_html_content, article_md_content, article_attach_ids ) values (#{articleModifyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{articleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{articleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleReadTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{articleUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{articlePlaceTop,jdbcType=BIT}, #{articleTopPriority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleAttachFile,jdbcType=BIT}, #{articleHtmlContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{articleMdContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{articleAttachIds,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
